name: STAR TOURNAMENT
description:
Astronomers still have much to learn about the vastness of the universe. The more they discover the more questions they have. While studying the stars they discovered people beings never before seen. These beings appear to battle by creating and throwing stars, using them to defeat one another in a never ending battle.

This is where stars come from. Here we stand before their training field, reporting to you live from this sector of space. Between one of their rounds we asked each of them a few questions about themselves, here are their answers: Red
  • What is your favorite color? “Teal.”
  • What are your strengths? “My arms.”
  • How old are you? “What.”
  • What do you see in your future? “I cannot see the future.”
  • What gets you up in the morning? “Myself.”
Blue
  • What is your favorite food? “What.”
  • Who is your mentor? “I don’t name meteors.”
  • How would you fire someone? “With a star.”
  • What is your name? “OFoubgsO43JBhcyx754”
  • What makes you uncomfortable? “These questions.”
Green
  • How do you handle failure? “Just do not fail.”
  • What is your dream job? “I do not dream of jobs.”
  • What is your greatest weakness? “Being hit by stars- thrown and stationary stars both cause damage.”
  • Are you an indoor or outdoor person? “Here.”
Yellow
  • What is your favorite animal? “Blue.”
  • Name your favorite thing about yourself? “That is a strange question but I guess I could name it Bob.”
  • What do you spend your day doing? “Training.”
  • What is your greatest fear? “Either falling or being hit by stars.”
  • Where have you traveled? “Here.”
Programming: James Tusha (http://www.twitter.com/PopDaddyGames) Level & Gameplay Design: Josh Damian (http://twitter.com/atmctype) Thanks for visiting our page!  Here are some gameplay tips 
  • Star Tournament is a 2-4 player local co-op game
  • The starting area is a safe zone and is also where you can upgrade your character.
  • Throw stars to damage other players. 
  • Collect hearts to increase your life - you can spend your hearts to buy upgrades for your character.
  • Start brings up the global pause menu. Select brings up a local pause menu for game info and character customization.
P.S. You need a controller to play this game! P.P.S. You can walk on stars ;) [Coming to MacOS & Linux on 15 June 2019] [$10 is our development price point. Purchase now to lock in the price before we get to our full release.]  Thanks for supporting the continued development of Star Tournament!
